lead.headline: API economy
lead.subhead: Power innovation and build new revenue streams by making APIs part of your business model. Connect with an IBM expert to find out how.

asset.body: Exposing digital services to employees, partners and consumers, the API economy is an environment that’s driving industry transformation as a result of cloud, mobile, the Internet of Things and cognitive computing. Application programming interfaces (APIs) are the glue connecting services and systems across and between organizations.For business leaders, when a business delivers an API, it expands its brand and revenue potential. For architects and developers, APIs create efficiencies and fuel innovation, turning a single idea into an industry-disrupting app.Read the white paper, “The Power of the API Economy,” to gain insight into these new business opportunities.

step.subhead: Three ways to thrive in the API economy
step.ctaLeadIn: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur.

step1.title: 1. Define an API strategy
step1.desc: Uncover your best opportunities for monetization and develop a clear path to fulfill them.

step2.title: 2. Build new APIs quickly
step2.desc: Easily develop and deploy robust APIs powered by Node.js capabilities.
step2.cta: Get started with Bluemix and StrongLoop

step3.title: 3. Secure and track your APIs
step3.desc: Manage access to your APIs, protect them from breaches and watch how they’re performing.
step3.cta: Sign up for a free trial
